markdownRemark.html:
The organizer of the draw can resend it. You need to ask them to follow these steps:

Enter the draw group > tap on the participant who needs the resend > tap on "resend email" > resend.

This way, the email will be received again.

If the draw page has already been visited before, there is a possibility to search the browser history for the draw link.

Did we help you? If you continue to have problems, just contact us. We are always available!

Happy secret santa!

frontmatter.title: DELETED EMAIL OR MISSING FROM INBOX
